name: Daydream Laser Beam
description:
Created for Trijam #71!

How to Play: Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Fire your laser with left Ctrl or the left mouse button. If you touch an enemy, the game ends.

Game Engine: Unity

Coding: Visual Studio

Graphics: Inkscape

Music/Sounds: Reaper

I started the project on my laptop while out of town with no internet. Without any sample libraries or synth VSTs installed, I was left with Reaper's default ReaSynth to make music. The laser sound is the same patch as the music, but with pitch changes.

Where I spent my time:

Music: 20 minutes

Sound: 2 minutes

Graphics: 20 minutes

Scene and Coding: 136 minutes
